basics.name: Lian Huang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am student double majoring in Computer Science with a focus in Data Science and Finance at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

highlights: Create reports on the current status of the company
Produce models of scenarios to reach company goals

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to undergraduate students who earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade, and do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Regent's Scholarship
awards.summary: Regents Scholarships are awarded to 20 outstanding freshmen who receive an SAT total score of at least 1340 or ACT combined score of at least 29, maintain at least a 3.5 GPA in academic subjects in high school, and whose extracurricular achievements are shown to be remarkable. Regents Scholars receive a full tuition waiver for four years of undergraduate study. All scholars receive $4,000 a year and a one-time travel grant of $2,000.
